title: AFME hires top regulator as new CEO
text:
AFME hires top regulator as new CEO

Stock Markets 40 minutes ago (Sep 17, 2019 11:45)

© Reuters. AFME hires top regulator as new CEO LONDON (Reuters) - Trade body the Association of Financial Markets in Europe has appointed Adam Farkas as chief executive, to succeed Simon Lewis. Farkas, who is currently executive director of the European Banking Authority, will take up his new role in February 2020. (This story corrects name of European Banking Authority in second paragraph)

AFME hires top regulator as new CEO
description: AFME hires top regulator as new CEO
